definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile

sentences.english: The responsible editor is the key factor of governing academic corrupt.
sentences.chinese: 責任編輯是整治學術腐敗環節中的關鍵。

definition: specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
to translate and edit/translator-editor/(computing) to compile (source code)
Liu Yi (-285), famous incorruptible official of Western Jin dynasty the Western Jin dynasty 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316)/Liu Yi (-412), general of Eastern Jin dynasty 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420)
to express gratitude (esp. in public)/vote of thanks
to check through (a document)/to proofread/to review (troops)
Zhang Bao (-184), leader of the Yellow Turban rebels during the late Han 漢朝|汉朝[Han4 chao2]
